mapper.select: SELECT a.noticeno, c.code_desc AS noticecode, a.noticetitle, b.usernickname AS noticewriter, a.noticewritetime FROM notice a INNER JOIN members b ON a.noticewriter = b.userno INNER JOIN common c ON a.noticecode = c.code AND c.code_group LIKE 'notice%'

SELECT a.noticeno, a.noticetitle, c.code AS noticecode, a.noticecontent, b.usernickname AS noticewriter, a.noticewritetime FROM notice a INNER JOIN members b ON a.noticewriter = b.userno INNER JOIN common c ON a.noticecode = c.code AND c.code_group LIKE 'notice%' WHERE a.noticeno = #{noticeno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (noticeno, noticecode, noticetitle, noticecontent, noticewriter, noticewritetime) VALUES (noticeno_seq.nextval, #{noticecode}, #{noticetitle}, #{noticecontent}, #{noticewriter}, SYSDATE)
